name: Fungus Amogus
description:
Submission for MiniJam #78 (Theme: Bugs; Limitation: You are the bad guy.)

Invading a peaceful hive of bugs, play as a parasitic fungus that consumes every living organism!
Either shrivel alone or shrivel with your victims. Once you are inside the host, you will inherit its body, giving access to new abilities specific to the host.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Space - Use Ability ( Only the Ant ability is working unfortunately)

LMB - Spit Acid

RMB - Shoot Parasite -> Successfully hitting a target consumes its body

Abilities:
Ant: Burrow -> Can burrow to cracked tiles and move underground                    Bedbug: Charge -> Charges at target, deals damage (not working atm)
Ladybug: Curl -> Reflects Projectiles by curling its body (not working atm)
Stink Bug: Acid Burst -> Releases acid around itself, damaging nearby (not working atm)

Note: This is a prototype and still on development . Everything is subject to change :)

Credits:
> Used and Altered Asset Pack : https://krishna-palacio.itch.io/minifantasy-dungeon
> Used audio samples from www.looperman.com/loops
